sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Maneuver) The character may take the Imbue Item maneuver, suffering 1 strain and committing force dice (white d12). He then grants one weapon or item within short range a temporary enhancement chosen from the following options: increase weapon's damage by 1, decrease the advantage cost for its Critical Hit or for any other single effect by 1, to a minimum of 1, or increase a piece of armor's ranged or melee defense by 1. Alternatively, the character can decrease an item's encumbrance by 2, to a minimum of 1. The character suffers 1 strain at the beginning of each of his turns in which he keeps this die committed.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <name>Imbue item</name> <number>TAL0001060</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 23:27:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7c63efe0db2e0c542901de90cf961982</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 23:27:31</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
